raw_body: REV. SISTER MARIE LOUISE A.C. (nee MARGARET MARY JOHNPILLAI),​ was called to her Eternal Rest on 8th January 2024. Requiem Mass was offered on 9th of January 2024 at 3.00 p.m. at Carmel Convent,​ Colombo 10,​ followed by interment at General Cemetery,​ Borella (Carmel Convent,​ 88,​ Ananda Rajakaruna Mawatha,​ Colombo 10).002363
